citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15 pm on
03/18/2014. A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection
process.
